issues.note: Lightbox overlay uses a dark veil in older variants; change to champagne translucency and add keyboard navigation.
Legacy tag hover color not tokenized; replace with brand token.
Legacy link hover color not tokenized; replace with brand token.
Selected-day color may use hard hex; tokenize and add aria-selected + keyboard support.
Alert red should be swapped for Champagne-compliant coral token; add aria-live=assertive.
Keep overlay ≤0.12–0.16 to avoid flattening gradient and gold keylines.
Ensure poster is set to avoid first-frame flash; PRM should collapse to poster.

packageScripts.prepush: pnpm run brand:guard && pnpm run verify:hue && pnpm test:brand

issues.summary: Hardcoded hex colours detected outside token directories; align with token usage or justify exceptions.
No dedicated parallax/sticky/scroll animation framework detected in dependencies; blueprint parity incomplete.

actions.action: Normalize colour usage to token variables or document intentional exceptions in guard configs.
Introduce a scroll/parallax framework (e.g., Lenis or GSAP ScrollTrigger) and wire core hero/treatment sections.
